properties.entry: select oc.code, count(*) from document d inner join anno_base ak on ak.document_id = d.document_id inner join anno_segment k on ak.anno_base_id = k.anno_base_id inner join anno_contain c on c.parent_anno_base_id = k.anno_base_id inner join anno_ontology_concept oc on oc.anno_base_id = c.child_anno_base_id where d.analysis_batch = 'cmc.2007' group by code
